title:
Encourage someone
There are days when you feel  tired and want to stay in bed, but you get up anyway...

attachments.displayName:
Encourage someone
There are days when you feel  tired and want to stay in bed, but you get up anyway.
Days when you feel like being sulky, but you smile for others
Days when the sweat of your brow is flowing like a river, but you kept going
Those days the encouragements may not be strong, motivation may not flow.
However, deep in your heart, there is still a light, a faint glow, flickering it may be,  you keep it lit, because you know, you know the day you stop, maybe that flame will go out.

My admiration to you all, for choosing to step forward this day and do the things that sometimes you do not want to do, for being the only one that stood up, and for smiling, though everything is saying don't.

#flowers   #pansy   #hqspflowers   #flowersphotography   #encouragement
